src:
Kejuaraan Taekwondo, Atlet Aceh Utara Sabet 14 Emas, 13 Perak, 7 Perunggu
03 Nov 2019, 21:47 by saifullah nurdin


Kejuaraan Taekwondo, Atlet Aceh Utara Sabet 14 Emas, 13 Perak, 7 Perunggu

KBRN, Lhokseumawe : Atlet Taekwondo Aceh Utara di bawah binaan Dojang KPU,Dojang Lilawangsa /011 Lhokseumamawe,  berhasil membawa pulang  sebanyak 14 emas,  13 perak  dan 7 perunggu, dilaga kejuaraan Pangkosek Hanudnas III Taekwondo Championship di GOR Futsal Dinas Pemuda dan Olah Raga jalan Wiliem Iskandar, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Manajer Taekwondo Aceh Utara, Dedi Suriadi,  menyebutkan Kejuaraan Pangkosekhamnudnas III diikuti ratusan atlit Taekwondo dari 4 provinsi di Pulau Sumatra dan kepulauan Riau, yang berlangsung selama tiga hari sejak 1-3 November 2019.
“Atlit kategori Junior dan Pra Junior berhasil meraih atau membawa pulang sebanyak 14 emas 13 Perak dan 7 peruggu, ini tidak terlepas dari semangat para atlit untuk melakukan latihan dan persiapan sebeleum bertanding, maupun fisik dan teknik, sehingga hasilnya membanggakan,” kata Dedy dalam siaran pers kepada RRI. Minggu (3/11/2019). 
Menurutnya prestasi dan penghargaan yang didapatkan atlit tidak terlepas dari hasil kerja keras, perjuangan dan doa selama ini serta dukungan dari semua pihak.
“Kami harapka prestasi ini bisa membawa harum daerah khusunya Aceh dan  Indonesia umum dalam bidang olah raga  Taekwondo ini , “harapnya.
text:
Taekwondo Championship, North Aceh Athlete 14 Gold Sabet, 13 Silver, 7 Bronze
03 Nov 2019, 21:47 by saifullah nurdin


Taekwondo Championship, North Aceh Athlete 14 Gold Sabet, 13 Silver, 7 Bronze

KBRN, Lhokseumawe: North Aceh Taekwondo Athlete under the guidance of the KPU Dojang, Dojang Lilawangsa / 011 Lhokseumamawe, succeeded in bringing home as many as 14 gold, 13 silver and 7 bronze, competed in the Pangkosek Hanudnas III Taekwondo Championship at the Youth Sport Hall and Wem Road Wem. Iskandar, Sunday (3/11/2019).
North Aceh Taekwondo Manager, Dedi Suriadi, said the Pangkosekhamnudnas III Championship was attended by hundreds of Taekwondo athletes from 4 provinces on the island of Sumatra and the Riau islands, which lasted for three days from 1-3 November 2019.
"Junior and Pre-Junior athletes won 14 gold and 13 silver medals and 7 peruggu, this is inseparable from the enthusiasm of athletes to do training and preparation before competing, as well as physical and technical, so the results are proud," Dedy said in a broadcast the press to RRI. Sunday (3/11/2019).
According to him, the achievements and awards obtained by athletes are inseparable from the results of hard work, struggle and prayers so far as well as support from all parties.
"We hope this achievement can bring fragrance to the region especially Aceh and Indonesia in the field of sports in Taekwondo," he hoped.
